entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Regina
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:39 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -27.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Regina Int'l Airport 02:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023
Condition: Mainly Clear
Temperature: -27.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -40
Dewpoint: -31.0°C
Wind: WSW 19 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 30. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023
